mapper.select: select * from document_catalog where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into document_catalog (project_id, parent_id, document_id, created_date, updated_date, title, folder) values (#{projectId}, #{parentUid}, #{documentId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{title}, #{folder})

insert into document_chapter (created_date, updated_date, title, isEmpty, download_link, upload_link, catalog_id) values (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{title}, #{isEmpty}, #{downloadLink}, #{uploadLink}, #{catalogUid})
